DOC.brief_summary: Inguinal hernia repair common procedure general surgery . Even acceptable complication rate , thousand patient worldwide suffer inguinal hernia surgery complication every year . In Finland , Finnish Patient Insurance Centre ( FPIC ) receive report surgical complication . In study , database FPIC use compare complication profile open laparoscopic inguinal hernia surgery mesh .
DOC.criteria: surgery 2002 2010 complicate inguinal hernia surgery report FPIC
